DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Characterize inheritance pattern mutation patient beta-oxidation disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Study Protein Translocation Patients With Beta-Oxidation Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients undergo clinical molecular analysis beta-oxidation enzyme metabolism . The evaluation include urinary metabolite profile , DNA familial study .
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA : Betaoxidation disorder , include : Mediumchain acylcoenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Longchain 3hydroxyacyl coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Verylongchain acylcoenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Shortchain 3hydroxyacyl coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency Longchain 3ketoacylcoenzyme A thiolase deficiency Trifunctional protein deficiency Patient age : 1 day
